alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:43AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Middlesex and central New Haven Counties through 230 AM EDT... At 143 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Beacon Falls, or near Naugatuck, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waterbury, Meriden, Middletown, Wallingford, Naugatuck, Southbury, Wolcott, Durham, Hamden, Cheshire, North Haven, Seymour, Derby, Prospect and Woodbridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
